A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I grew up with SW in the 70s\, I love the OT\, 
and the Prequels gave me some awesome moments (though jar jar is unforgivable).

When TFA came out I really enjoyed what they did and was willing to overlook
the rehashing of OT story lines. So long as they went forward with a new story arc
in the next 2 movies.....

And here we are\, WTF happened?

This movie manages to ruin beloved OT characters\, ruin TFA characters and 
pretty much give us a SJW movie that ruins SW forever!

Disney does not understand the Lucas vision\, this is all about money\, even Mark Hamill
was unhappy with what they did to Luke. 

What we got was so bad it even ruins the TFA!

That said\, it was made for the SJW crowd and to appeal to Disney's fan base\,
so I understand why some people will enjoy it.

So like or hate it\, it exists and nothing will ever sadly change that.
